page.title: 15BLEACHING AND DYEING
page.content: Belmont Bleaching and Dyeing Company has dealt in{textiles}for about hundred years.It was originally a paper mill.It is owned by a local family.The company is the place of {employment}for about hundred workers. 85 of them are men.In earlier times many{villagers}worked there,but because of the attraction of the rural location of Belmont village,the price of its property is now quite expensive and often bought by more affluent commuters. Less than ten villagers now work there. The company is also able to waterproof and brush cloth as well as dyeing cloth for dresses etc.It deals with special cloth used in the{manufacture of some attire for our military forces.About 6,000,000 metres of cloth are dealt with in a year.
